articles.author: Lexi Carson
articles.title: Evan Peters Says He Was “Shocked” Jessica Lange Is Returning to ‘American Horror Story’ - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The Oscar-winning actress exited the series in 2015, while the 'Monster: The Jeffrey Dahmer Story' Emmy winner departed in 2019. The former on-screen mother and son will reunite for season 13.
articles.content:
Evan Peters is looking forward to returning to the American Horror Story universe — and he’s not alone.
From the anthology series’ 2011 debut season, Murder House, to 2021’s Double Feature and seven… [+2463 chars]
